Module org.spongepowered.math
Package org.spongepowered.math.matrix

Class Matrix2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.math.matrix.Matrix2d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Matrixd
    @Immutable
public final class Matrix2d
extends Object
implements Matrixd, Serializable
    A 2x2 matrix containing values of type double.`
